Description_lang: Avatar increases your damage dealt by an additional $364641s1% and decreases damage taken by $364641s2%. Avatar instantly grants Outburst.

description_blz.en_US: Avatar increases your damage dealt by an additional 10% and decreases damage taken by 10%. Avatar instantly grants Outburst.
description_blz.es_MX: Avatar aumenta tu daño infligido un 10% más y reduce el daño recibido un 10%. Avatar otorga Arrebato al instante.
description_blz.pt_BR: Avatar aumenta em 10% o dano causado e reduz em 10% o dano recebido. Avatar concede Estouro instantaneamente.
description_blz.de_DE: 'Avatar' erhöht den verursachten Schaden um zusätzlich 10% und verringert den erlittenen Schaden um 10%. Avatar gewährt sofort 'Wutausbruch'.
description_blz.en_GB: Avatar increases your damage dealt by an additional 10% and decreases damage taken by 10%. Avatar instantly grants Outburst.
description_blz.es_ES: Avatar aumenta un 10% extra el daño que infliges y reduce un 10% el que recibes. Avatar otorga Arrebato al instante.
description_blz.fr_FR: Avatar augmente les dégâts que vous infligez de 10% supplémentaires et réduit ceux que vous subissez de 10%. Confère instantanément Accès de rage.
description_blz.it_IT: Avatar aumenta i danni inflitti del 10% aggiuntivo e riduce i danni subiti del 10%. Avatar fornisce istantaneamente Sfogo.
description_blz.ru_RU: "Аватара" увеличивает наносимый вами урон еще на 10% и уменьшает получаемый урон на 10%. Кроме того, "Аватара" дает эффект "Вспышка гнева".
description_blz.ko_KR: 투신이 공격력을 추가로 10%만큼 증가시키고, 받는 피해는 10%만큼 감소시킵니다. 또한, 투신 시전 시 즉시 격발을 얻습니다.
description_blz.zh_TW: 巨像化身使你造成的傷害額外提高10%、受到的傷害降低10%。巨像化身會立刻賦予爆發。
description_blz.zh_CN: 天神下凡使你造成的伤害额外提高10%，受到的伤害降低10%。天神下凡立即使你获得怒意迸发效果。
